table.name: Storeroom
table.data:
-- Create the top-level storerooms. These come from the WAREHOUSE table in MP2 INSERT INTO .dbo.Location ([ID],[Desc]) SELECT SL.[LocationID], S.[DESCRIPTION] FROM .dbo.WAREHOUSE as S join .dbo.StoreroomLinkages as SL on S.[MAINBOSSID] = SL.[ID]
INSERT INTO .dbo.RelativeLocation ([ID], [LocationID], [Code], [ContainingLocationID], [Hidden]) SELECT SL.[RelativeLocationID], SL.LocationID, RLC.[Code], B.[MAINBOSSID], RLC.[HIDDEN] FROM .dbo.WAREHOUSE as S join .dbo.StoreroomLinkages as SL on S.[MAINBOSSID] = SL.[ID] join .dbo.SITE as B on S.[PRIMARYSITE] = B.[SITEID] join .dbo.RelativeLocationCodes as RLC on SL.[RelativeLocationID] = RLC.ID
INSERT INTO .dbo.PermanentStorage ([ID], [RelativeLocationID]) SELECT SL.[PermanentStorageID], SL.RelativeLocationID FROM .dbo.WAREHOUSE as S join .dbo.StoreroomLinkages as SL on S.[MAINBOSSID] = SL.[ID]
-- Create the sublocation storerooms. These come from the STOCK table in MP2 where we built a SubStoreroomLinkage in Initialization INSERT INTO .dbo.Location ([ID],[Desc]) SELECT SL.[LocationID], NULL FROM .dbo.SubStoreroomLinkages as SL
INSERT INTO .dbo.RelativeLocation ([ID], [LocationID], [Code], [ContainingLocationID]) SELECT SL.[RelativeLocationID], SL.LocationID, SL.[Code], SL.[StoreroomLocationID] FROM .dbo.SubStoreroomLinkages as SL
INSERT INTO .dbo.PermanentStorage ([ID], [RelativeLocationID]) SELECT SL.[PermanentStorageID], SL.RelativeLocationID FROM .dbo.SubStoreroomLinkages as SL
